properties.entry: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO,ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SQ_ATTACHMENT_PK.NEXTVAL,?, ?, ?)
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY FILE_NO
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SQ_ATTACHMENT_PK.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
